0010111010010010 0000011011100101 0 -> sum: 0011010101110111, cout: 0

0011101000111110 1010001011111101 1 -> sum: 1101110100111100, cout: 0
0110111010010100 1001011001110000 0 -> sum: 0000010100000100, cout: 1
0010011100101000 0111010000001100 1 -> sum: 1001101100110101, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
